audioText: Cette application mobile offre-t-elle de vrais avantages pour la productivité ?
question: What does the speaker question about the mobile app?
options: Whether it offers real benefits for productivity
Whether it costs too much money
Whether it works on all devices
Whether it has good customer support
explanation: The text states 'Cette application mobile offre-t-elle de vrais avantages pour la productivité ?' - Does this mobile app offer real benefits for productivity? 'Vrais' means 'real/true', questioning the genuine value of the app. The distractors test misinterpretation of the question (costs too much, works on all devices, good customer support).
